flawed_nl_solution:
The total ratio representing the number of photos in the Malachi gallery is 10+17=<<10+17=27>>27
The difference in the ratios representing the number of photos Malachi took this year and last year is 17-10=<<17-10=11>>11.
This year, Malachi took 11/27*2430= <<11/27*2430=990>>990 more photos than he took last year.
#### 990

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
